snippet.title: Rob N Run  [ early acces trailer ]
snippet.description:
Valdim is a happy robber. The trouble begins when he contracts a debt he must repay as soon as possible. He must now run for his life.Taking the gold will not be peacefull since the places that Vladim is going to "visit" are filled with traps and dangerous creatures.

Play the game : https://kayugames.itch.io/robnrun

- Demo
- Early acces
- OST
Rob'n Run is a one screen, platformer game with a speedrun gameplay for PC . The main caracter can cross the edges of the screen to find the exit and solve labyrinthine paths.
